subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jerry Jones, the N.F.L.’s most irrepressible salesman, dreamer and entrepreneur, has worked to turn Dallas into the center of the sports world and AT&T Stadium into a magnet for what he calls “iconic events.”
snippet: Jerry Jones, the N.F.L.’s most irrepressible salesman, dreamer and entrepreneur, has worked to turn Dallas into the center of the sports world and AT&T Stadium into a magnet for what he calls “iconic events.”
